page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT-OUR PARENTS'JOBS
page.content: Although unemployment in our area is high, all the fathers of the children at Hale School have jobs. Only one father works in Hale; he looks after the garden at Hale House. The rest all travel to work and sev- eral go abroad as part of their job. Our Fathers' jobs cover a wide field:- Painting and decorating. Join- ery. Gardening. Machinery maintenance. Geology. Horticulture. Shop-work. Motor trading. Restaurant management. Pyrotechnics. Electronics. Flight control. Haulage contracting. Accoun- tancy.Working with asbestos. A soli- citor. About half our Mothers,in addition to being housewives, have other jobs,some of them part-time.Four do nursing,one is a physoitherapist,two are secretar- ies,one is a cook,one teaches,one delivers papers and one picks fruit.
